Start Instruction

Welcome !!

Choose a number greater than 13 to set the starting total.
During the game play, players are only allowed to pick a number between 1, 2, or 3 to subtract from the total. The game continues until one player is left with the chilli. If the computer ends up with the chilli, congratulations, you win! If you are the one left with the chilli, the computer claims victory. Use your strategic skills to avoid being left with the chilli and enjoy the thrill of the "Chilli Showdown"!
